item.title: GA: 1. Binary search
item.description: Statement This article is my study notes from the book: grokking algorithm: an illustrated guide for programmers and other curious people. Please refer to the original work for more details and indicate the source for reprinting. Chapter 1: Binary Search 1. Tips About Binary Search * Binary search is a lot faster than simple search. * O(log n) is faster than O(n), but it gets a lot faster once the list of items youâ€™re searching through grows.
